name: Coyote (itch)
description:
Protect the herd from the coyotes and vultures that attack them. If you let them too close, they will steal a sheep. Watch out for the scorpions, as they will scare the coyotes to dash forward. Every 10,000 points a cactus flower will appear. Shoot it to get more sheep.

On a computer, use the left and right arrow keys to control direction, and the space key to shoot. Press the I key for info, the P key to play and the Return key to pause.

On a tablet or phone, swipe the right side of the screen to control direction, and tap on the left side to shoot. Tap at the top to pause.
